title: Renew a Customer's Annual Contract
description: A major customer's annual supply contract is due for renewal next month.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's existing contract to review the terms and pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the current contract from the document repository.

tasks.description: Generate a new draft contract for the upcoming year, applying a standard annual price increase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a draft of the new contract with updated pricing.

tasks.description: Send the draft contract to the customer for their review and signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent emails the new contract to the customer's procurement contact.
